abstract: The smart money in the millennium’s first decade — or at least its final year — was in junk bonds, and the junkier the better.
snippet: The smart money in the millennium’s first decade — or at least its final year — was in junk bonds, and the junkier the better.
lead_paragraph: THE decade now ending could be called the Zeroes, but for the fact that stock investors only wish they had done so well.

headline.main: Great Year, but S.&P. Closes in on its Worst Decade Ever
headline.print_headline: Great Year, but S.& P. Closes In on its Worst Decade
